Content:
They're Harley branded ,the Pilot 3 in 1 X04 or the Gargoyle X07 3 in 1 .
Or any other 3 in 1 .
I've just bought a Sports bike a Buell 1125R and I need some wind protection .
I only have half hats at the moment.
